channel.title: [VFM] Mountainous Arson - (12/15) - Completed - Town Wins
channel.description:
# Welcome to Mountainous Arson!
Hosted by Luxy Co-Hosted by @DatBird
# Rules:
1. Be Respectful at All Times 2. Do not, or attempt to, angleshoot. If you have reason to believe that you know someone's alignment from out of game information, message the host and you will be replaced. 3. Do not weaponise the moderator. 4. Do not communicate in any threads not sanctioned by the host. 5. Follow the global forum rules. 6. Speak in English only.
# Gameplay:
Cycles are 48/24. The Mafia will communicate via a private message on the forums. The Mafia have a factional douse, and a factional ignite. They may be used on the same night. The Mafia are not allowed to ignite Night 1. The Mafia have three ignites over the course of the game. When the mafia ignites, all people who have been doused will die. Lynches are majority only. The Mafia's douse night action is compulsive and will be randomised if not picked and ignite is not selected. A minimum of five posts per irl day is required, if you do not meet this requirement twice, you will be replaced out.
# Roles:
> # [color=green]Town Citizen[/color] > You have no abilities except your voice and your vote. Put them to good use! > *You win when all of the Mafia are dead.*
> # [color=red]Mafia Arsonist[/color] > You are aligned with the mafia, you have the following abilities: > * Factional Douse: At night you may douse a player in gasoline. > * Factional Ignite: At night you may light all doused players on fire, killing them all. > * Factional Chat: You share a chat with your fellow mafia. It is active both day and night. > > *You win when the number of Mafia equal the number of Town.*
# Rolelist:
**[color=green]Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen Town Citizen[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia Arsonist Mafia Arsonist Mafia Arsonist[/color]**
# Players:
1. Geyde 2. KyoDaz - Mafia 3. Arete 4. ~~Marshal~~ Maxwell 5. Alice/Monokuma 6. Kai_5 7. H_Hjasik 8. ~~Icibalus~~ - [color=red]Lynched D1[/color] - [color=red]Mafia Arsonist[/color] 9. Vulgard 10. Shurian - Mafia 11. eevee 12. JakeTheWolfie 13. MaximusPrime 14. sulit 15. Magnus
# Useful Links:
[EoD1: Icibalus is Lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-mountainous-arson-14-15-night-1-ici-is-dead-us/78852/2611?u=luxy)

item.title: [VFM] Mountainous Arson - (12/15) - Completed - Town Wins
item.dc:creator: Vulgard
item.description:
Vulgard:

I’m afraid Ici has rolled scum this game

I have no idea how I caught that

Vulgard:

I would prefer not to call Max 100% scum because of a perceived scumslip. The amount of times I’ve seen ‘scumslips’ come from town here is staggering and even if Max disagrees, I don’t actually want to mislynch him again (though last time I did it I was scum but w/e).

eoafkepea
Max was town and I was right

Vulgard:

/vote MaximusPrime

I defended him at first but there is some solid meta evidence right there.

Vulgard:

If this is the game where he decided to switch things up then this is pretty damn unfortunate.

Roses are red
Violets are blue
You’re probably town
Since I’m voting you

still right

Vulgard:

Geyde and Maximus’ votes just stick out to me as fweh (this is my shorthand for ‘they make me uncomfy’) and I decided to point it out.

I actually still have no idea what happened there with these votes.

Vulgard:

I’m afraid Icibalus is trying his best to mislynch me.

:>

Vulgard:

Incorrect read, but incorrect in a very towny way from my perspective.
Arete is town. Next.

My pattern of ‘my shortest reads are my most accurate reads’ continues. I have no idea how I’m supposed to make this work in future games.

Vulgard:

But I think that unless he’s leveling and trying to build a fake association (which is 300 IQ since it takes advantage of Alice not posting), he’s probably town.

he was leveling and trying to build a fake association.
This was surprisingly accurate.

Vulgard:

To be fair, when I look at the ISO as a whole I can see a scum member trying to make sick playz from the start of the game and failing miserably.
It’s just kinda weird to me but maybe ‘weird’ doesn’t mean ‘Kyo is town.’

OOF.

Vulgard:

I’m saying this is town indicative of Marshal’s slot because he’s not jumping, he’s coming up with independent reasons and doing the push on me by himself when other people have moved on.

Vulgard:

I also think Kai is town because I’m comparing him to SFoL 00 and he feels similar. Not in tone or anything, but in the fact I don’t think his reads are correct at all - and yet he has confidence.

Stupid reason to TR again, I know. I can’t really help it.

short reads = accurate reads
How am I supposed to work with this. If I keep giving short reads nobody will listen to me or be convinced.

Vulgard:

@KyoDaz Please get over here. People are putting you on a scumteam with Magnus but even Magnus says you’re scum which is an oof.

I can be funny sometimes.

Read full topic
